title: Trump defends pardon of Binance founder Changpeng Zhao: ‘Don’t believe I’ve ever met him, but he had a lot of support’
contentSnippet: On Thursday, President Donald Trump issued a pardon for the former Binance CEO, who previously served four months in prison.

title: RAND Warns of AI-Driven Cyber Chaos in New ‘Robot Insurgency’ Report
contentSnippet: RAND Corporation's simulation has shed light on how a rogue AI could cripple U.S. infrastructure before humans could react.

title: Wallets Tied to Melania Trump Meme Coin Airdropped $1.2 Million in Meteora Tokens
contentSnippet: Meteora’s co-founder resigned from his leadership role due to his part in the MELANIA launch. Now wallets linked to it just received an airdrop of $1.2 million in MET.

title: BNB, World Liberty, Meme Coins Jump After Trump Pardons Binance Founder
contentSnippet: Coins and tokens linked to crypto mogul Changpeng Zhao and President Trump jumped in price following news of the latest pardon.

title: OpenAI's ChatGPT Atlas Browser Has a Big Problem—How Crypto Users Can Protect Themselves
contentSnippet: OpenAI's AI web browser faces prompt injection attacks that security experts call an unsolved problem—but there are some things you can do to be safe.

title: JPMorgan says Stripe’s ‘twin revolutions’ in AI and money movement could unlock a $350 billion market
contentSnippet: Recent acquisitions and the launch of the Tempo L1 mark Stripe’s return to crypto infrastructure as AI-driven commerce gains traction.

title: Alleged 'Trump Insider Whale' Closes $200 Million Bitcoin Short
contentSnippet: A wallet alleged to have connections to President Trump's family closed a major Bitcoin short ahead of Thursday's price jump.

title: Benchmark Boosts Bitcoin Miner Maker Canaan's Stock Target, Praising 'Turnaround Story'
contentSnippet: The firm's stock rose Thursday, and has traded solidly above $1 during October.

title: Canada Hits Crypto Firm With $126 Million Fine
contentSnippet: Cryptomus has been fined $126 million for failing to report thousands of high-risk transactions tied to child abuse, ransomware, and Iran-linked transfers.

title: Solana treasury firm Solmate’s stock surges 50% amid plans for validator center and ‘aggressive M&A strategy’
contentSnippet: The company formerly known as Brera Holdings rebranded last month into a Solana-based digital asset treasury.

title: The Daily: Trump pardons CZ, memecoin lawsuit claims, MegaETH whitepaper leak, legacy asset manager joins crypto ETF race, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Bitcoin Climbs to $111K as Whipsaw Action in Crypto Continues
contentSnippet: The trend has most definitely not been your friend this week as dips get bought and rallies get sold.

title: Can Beyond Meat Match the GameStop Meme Stock Craze?
contentSnippet: Beyond Meat is facing its first test since becoming a meme stock sensation, with its stock down more than half since the peak. Can it rebound?

title: No Bull? Bitcoin Recognized as 'Apex Predator of Money' With Shark Statue
contentSnippet: The artwork also pays homage to Damien Hirst.

title: Institutions Drive CME Crypto Options to $9B as ETH, SOL, XRP Set Records
contentSnippet: Open interest across CME’s regulated markets jumped 27% since Oct. 10, signaling growing conviction among large traders.

title: DeFi lender Spark deploys $100 million into Superstate fund to diversify revenue as US Treasury yields dip
contentSnippet: Spark allocated $100 million of its stablecoin reserves into a Superstate fund generating yield from a crypto cash and carry trade.

title: The Crypto Industry Must Evolve to Match Real-World Security Risks
contentSnippet: Security issues like data breaches and phishing attacks are a type of feedback for Web3 designers, argues Tools for Humanity’s Adrian Ludwig.

title: Myriad Moves: Does Bitcoin Bounce Before 'Uptober' Ends, and Who Wins the World Series?
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include price predictions on Bitcoin and Ethereum, as well as chances the Dodgers win the World Series.

title: Bitcoin skeptic Peter Schiff pitches onchain gold tokenization app, CZ calls it a ‘trust-me-bro’ token
contentSnippet: Schiff argues gold is “the one thing that makes sense to put on a blockchain,” while critics say trust, not code, still rules.

title: Swiss Crypto Bank AMINA Taps Tokeny to Build Compliant 'Bridge' for Asset Tokenization
contentSnippet: The partnership combines AMINA Bank’s Swiss-regulated custody with Tokeny’s blockchain infrastructure to ease tokenisation for financial institutions.

title: Revolut, Blockchain.com and Bitcoin app Relai score MiCA licenses with Plasma likely to follow
contentSnippet: After MiCA took effect at the end of last year, crypto-asset service providers have been expected to obtain a new license.

title: JPMorgan says bitcoin miners are decoupling from the bitcoin price as they pivot to AI
contentSnippet: As bitcoin miners allocate more resources to AI computing, the growth in bitcoin’s network hashrate is likely to slow, according to JPMorgan.

title: Fidelity Crypto adds Solana support, extending its lineup beyond Bitcoin, Ethereum and Litecoin
contentSnippet: Before Oct. 23, only Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin had buy, sell, and trading support on the Fidelity Crypto platform.

title: Fireblocks buys crypto authentication startup Dynamic, completing its offerings from ‘custody to consumer’
contentSnippet: The acquisition adds Dynamic’s wallet and onboarding tools to Fireblocks’ institutional-grade custody stack, expanding its reach into consumer-facing crypto apps.

title: Stellar Edges Lower 0.4% to $0.3123 as Partnership News Surfaces
contentSnippet: Double-top reversal at $0.3147 resistance overshadows collaborative payment infrastructure developments.

title: Binance's CZ Wins Pardon From U.S. President Donald Trump
contentSnippet: U.S. President Donald Trump pardoned Binance founder Changpeng Zhao months after he said he'd asked for a pardon.

title: HBAR Dips 1.4% to $0.1675 Breaking Below Key Support Zone
contentSnippet: HBAR’s technical structure turned firmly bearish after repeated failures at the $0.1700 resistance zone, while a surge in volume confirmed a decisive support break.

title: Alt5 Sigma Suspends CEO Peter Tassiopoulos, Appoints Jonathan Hugh as Interim Leader
contentSnippet: No reason was given for the suspension of Tassiopoulos, who was appointed just over a year ago .

title: Crypto for Advisors: The Growth of Stablecoins
contentSnippet: Stablecoin adoption surges post-GENIUS Act. Discover how cost savings, liquidity, and regulatory clarity are driving their growth in global finance.

title: Fireblocks Acquires Dynamic to Expand On-Chain Developer Stack
contentSnippet: The deal unites Fireblocks’ institutional custody infrastructure with Dynamic’s consumer wallet and onboarding tech to create an end-to-end onchain platform, it said.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
contentSnippet: Google’s Gemini AI can help organize research, compare tokenomics and cut through noise. Here’s a workflow to analyze coins before you invest responsibly.

title: How to use ChatGPT to find hidden gems in the crypto market

title: Early crypto gems: How to discover them first
contentSnippet: Spot early crypto gems in 2025 with five key checks — builders, usage, liquidity, token design and security — to avoid exit liquidity traps.

title: FIFA’s blockchain-based tickets face scrutiny from Swiss gambling regulator
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s gambling watchdog is reviewing FIFA’s “Right to Buy” NFTs, while noting no wrongdoing has been alleged.
